name: City Runner (VinnyDev)
description:
A 2.5D platform runner  personal game project  made in Unity.

Game controls

W - Jump

W x 2 - Double jump

S - land on ground quicker/ apply gravity

get shield to avoid dying on obstacles

What I worked on

  • Conceived and prototyped multiple physics-based abilities
  • Designed  infinite scroller game level 
  • Programmed all game mechanics and UI mechanics in C# in unity
  • Designed and implemented a  score system,  and UI menus to make the game fun and challenging.
  • Wrote editor tools for level design
  • Implemented a high score system which show your highest score for the current session upon losing.
